span.p:
Like a puzzle with
imperfect pieces

div.style: color: white !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Like balancing
many scales at once
